subject: Re: [junit] trouble with JUnit and XML
msgSnippet: Scott, I apologize for not looking at the JUnit FAQ (RTFM ing) more closely. I have updated the excluded.properties and it works as you said. Thanks, Nilesh
messageBody:
Scott,
I apologize for not looking at the JUnit FAQ (RTFM'ing) more closely.
I have updated the excluded.properties and it works as you said.
Thanks,
Nilesh

Scott Stirling wrote:

> This is the #1 JUnit FAQ -- same root problem as the LinkageError problem
> with XML classes.
>
> Here's the answer (from memory, so you might want to double-check):
>
> - update excluded.properties in the junit.jar file to include org.w3c.dom.*
> and org.xml.sax.*
